participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and active, enjoys outdoor activities and values health.
participant_1.background: i am married. i enjoy sports such as running. i'm a vegetarian. my favorite color is blue. i am a woman.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: motivated and resilient, passionate about fitness and helping others overcome challenges.
participant_2.background: i am a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach.
